xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the wmi_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the wmi_test.

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the wmi_test

metadata.title: Microsoft Windows is installed

family_object.comment: This is the default family object. Only one family object should exist.

notes.note: This CPE Name represents the Windows OS
